channel.title: How do i use my server on...? Updated Question
channel.description:
RIGHT,
Ive made my server port fowarded it and no-ip and changed my variables etc etc
Im at the stage of running it with a client and a source server
I am trying to run my server with Project Fast and Furious and i need to know how to run my server with the client of project F&F???
Do i need to input codes or do i need to put a new file in or change something somewhere in one of the files
If ur answering a question please could u put where i would find this file etc because i then have to ask more questions and people get annoyed
Thanks

item.source: How do i use my server on...? Updated Question

item.title: How do i use my server on...? Updated Question
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

First you click the run.bat button in your source files and then it runs and its on.
Then go into the client and open up client.java. CTRL+F search “setserver” and change the ip to 127.0.0.1

Save and compile

Read full topic

item.description:
@fuck_me_now wrote:

no error… but im a newbie to starting a server…

I have gone through the process of no-ip.com and port forwarding etc etc…

but ive downloaded a client and a source… project fast and furious well how do i run my server on that client??

also

can i get other people to come onto my server when ive run it?

Read full topic

item.title: How do i use my server on...? Updated Question
item.dc:creator: @I_r_Pwn_u I r Pwn u
item.description:
@I_r_Pwn_u wrote:

You don’t need to input anything on the server unless it’s a client/server source. Which can only be connected through the client, if that’s you’re problem then just download a different source. Can’t explain at the moment what you need to edit.

Read full topic
